column1: Little Goat Diner////We got served pretty quickly and the restaurant was really cute. The food was delicious with Asian fushion in the dishes. This little piggy went to China has szechuan pork sausage. And
column2: if you haven't had it before
column3: it's a very particular spice that changes how your taste buds will taste other foods. I really like it
column4: but it can be a little surprising if you haven't had it before. The breakfast tasty thing had these HUGE slices of bacon. I typically don't care whether a dish has bacon (crazy
column6: but the bacon thick slices were super tasty.
